metadata.title: Unified Information-Density Theory (UIDT) v3.5: DESI-Optimized Framework
metadata.description: Version 3.5 of the Unified Information-Density Theory presents a consolidated framework for the Yang-Mills mass gap and cosmological tensions. This revision integrates DESI DR2 and JWST CCHP data to fix the holographic scale at 0.66 nm. All claims are classified by evidence status (Category A-D).
metadata.notes: DESI-Optimized Revision. Supersedes v3.3 and v3.4.
